text.tspan: How to make slides with Inkslides
1. Designate a layer for the slide layouts. Call it "Control Layer".
2. Draw a rectangle of size 800x600. Move it to 0, 0.
3. Clone the rectangle to form the layout of the slides.
The slides will be displayed from left to right, from top to bottom.
Remember to remove the clone overlapping the original rectangle.
4. Select the any of the clones, use Extension->Install Inkslides.
The control layer now gets 50% transparency.
5. Create a new layer for the contents and create the slides.
6. Visit the svg in a browser. (e.g., Firefox)
